title: Top-Down Modular Asset Pack
description: Our collection of top-down 2D assets with modular placement and animation for a top down game
longDescription:
Here we have our collection of top-down 2D assets these assets are modular and come with basic animations,

we use them to make a simple 2D shooter. It will require some work if you want to create your own assets as all of these are created by our artists but with the simplistic style it shouldn't be to hard.

The animations are only pictures in a sequence like most paper 2D games (see image 4 for examples)


What does this pack contain?


Buildings


Building Parts

  • Doors 40 Unique Doors
  • Signs 18 Unique Shopfront Signs
  • Windows 11 Windows
  • Extras 9 Extra (Vents, Chimney, Gutters Etc)

Roofs

  • Gable Roof 6 gable roof and ridgeline (3 colour variations)
  • Simple Roof 4 simple roofs (3 colour variations) including flat roof

Walls

  • Gable Walls 15 gable walls (15 Colour, texture and pattern variations)
  • Simple Walls 15 walls (15 Colour, texture and pattern variations to match gable)

Fences

  • Fences 9 Different Fences (Open & Close Animations)

Pre Fab

  • Prefab basic building 4 Prefab Buildings (mainly for level block out)


Cars


Type 1

  • 14 Variations (Inc Police Car) 42 (Including left and right steering animations)

Type 2

  • 5 Variations 15 (Including left and right steering animations)

Sirens

  • 2 Sirens (These will have to follow the car as they are a separate images of Red and Blue lights, image 6 for example)


Characters


Characters

  • 20 Unique Characters (10 Police)

Animations for each

  • Death
  • Walk/run
  • AK-47
  • Double Barrel Shotgun
  • Pistol
  • LMG
  • M4A1
  • MAC-10
  • Pump Shotgun
  • Revolver
  • Sniper

Blood

  • Simple Blood Decals (1 animations of blood pool over time and 1 blood trail)


Effects


Muzzle Flashes

  • Simple Muzzle Flash (Heavy, medium, shotgun and pistol weapon flashes. We pose these in front of gun after firing)

Pick-ups

  • Simple gun, ammo and item pick-ups (only a small selection and would be easy to create your own)


Extras


A selection of extra assets for placing about the town

  • Bicycles
  • Dog Kennel
  • Chicken Coop
  • Playground
  • Dropped Cash


Graffiti


A large selection of graffiti artwork to add character to your environment

  • 38 custom graffiti artworks including gang, police, turf, and more


Roads


A Simple road system so you can easily build your city how you want.

  • Roads
  • Crossings
  • Road Markings
  • Drains
  • Dirt Roads
  • Damage Decals
  • And More


Path


Paths & decals

  • Paths with many designs and variations
  • Decals to add dirt and wear to paths


UI Assets


UI Assets

  • Combo Multiplier ( 2x 5x 10x )
  • Health Icons (Energy, Mood, Health Icons)
  • Wanted Stars
  • Map Icons (A Collection of 16 map radar icons for Bank, Car, Home, Enemy Etc.
  • Numbers 0-9 for using as money counter (GBP, USD, RBL Icons Inc)


Weapons


Side View (Grey Icons for use on UI)


  • AK-47
  • Double Barrel Shotgun
  • Pistol
  • LMG
  • M4A1
  • MAC-10
  • Pump Shotgun
  • Revolver
  • Sniper


Top View

  • AK-47
  • Double Barrel Shotgun
  • Pistol
  • LMG
  • M4A1
  • MAC-10
  • Pump Shotgun
  • Revolver
  • Sniper


We plan to update this with releases of our new packs and we take suggestions on what we can add to the roster so don't be shy to email us and ask at RoyLWorks@hotmail.com
technicalDetails:
Number of Textures: 1082 Files, 280 Folders


Texture Resolutions: From (44 x 44) to (1024 x 1024)


Email: RoyLWorks@hotmail.com


Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
